title: Province
description: The state or province information, including the [ISO 3166-2:2013](https://www.iso.org/standard/63546.html)-formatted state or province code. Useful for statistical, market region, or geolocation purposes.

province_code.description: The [state or province code](/api/rest/reference/state-codes/), as defined by [ISO 3166-2:2013](https://www.iso.org/standard/63546.html).

local_name.description: The local province name. For example, California or Northern Ireland.

latin_name.description: The Latin province name, if the local name is in non-Latin script. For example, `北京` for Beijing.

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation, if required. For example, `CA` for California.
